DeletedTextInterceptor - Interface in org.netbeans.spi.editor.typinghooks
An interceptor which is called when user deletes text from a document.
DeletedTextInterceptor.Context - Class in org.netbeans.spi.editor.typinghooks
The context class providing information about the edited document, its editor pane and the offset where the delete key event occurred.
DeletedTextInterceptor.Factory - Interface in org.netbeans.spi.editor.typinghooks
The factory interface for registering DeletedTextInterceptors in MimeLookup.
